title: ICE: ty::TypeVariants::hash_stable() - Unexpected variant TyInfer(?0)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
When running `cargo check` from [this directory at this commit](https://github.com/ezrosent/allocators-rs/tree/86f3fc8eba2edf6ea169555b2980814c636b0b20/elfmalloc), I got the following ICE:
Output 
error: internal compiler error: librustc/ich/impls_ty.rs:906: ty::TypeVariants::hash_stable() - Unexpected variant TyInfer(?0).

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', librustc_errors/lib.rs:540:9
note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace.
stack backtrace:
